doc.after: Music in 19th century Russia was defined by the tension between classical composer Mikhail Glinka along with other members of The Mighty Handful who embraced Russian national identity and added religious and folk elements to their compositions and the Russian Musical Society led by composers Anton and Nikolay Rubinsteins which was musically conservative The later tradition of Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky one of the greatest composers of the Romantic era was continued into the 20th century by Sergei Rachmaninoff 288 World renowned composers of the 20th century include Alexander Scriabin Igor Stravinsky Sergei Prokofiev Dmitri Shostakovich and Alfred Schnittke
